Description:
Detects successful installation of Atera Remote Monitoring & Management (RMM) agent as recently found to be used by Conti operators

Author: Bhabesh Raj
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Atera Agent Installation
Query: sourcetype='windows-application' eql select * from _source_ where eventid = '1033' and provider_name = 'msiinstaller' and message like '%ateraagent%'
